entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for August 15, 2024

summary.caption: “Oh, professor … did I tell you I had another out-of-head experience last night?”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for August 15, 2024

summary.caption: “Aaaaaaa! … No, Zooky! Grok et bok! … Shoosh! Shoosh! …”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for August 15, 2024

summary.caption:
“Don’t be ’fraid, Dug. Me teach him sit on finger. … Closer,
 Dug, closer.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for August 15, 2024
The Far Side comic 5 for August 15, 2024

summary.caption: “Well, this guidebook is worthless! It just says these people worshipped two gods: one who was all-knowing and one who was all-seeing—but they don’t tell you which is which, for crying out loud!”
